data.actual_result: Image overlaps keeping you on mutual friends (can't swap to mutual servers or user info) until you close the profile modal and reopen.
data.expected_result: No friends in common image stays within its bounds and you can go back to mutual servers and user info.
data.short_description: No friends in common image overlaps and stops you from opening mutual servers/user info.
data.steps_to_repro: - Find someone who you do not have any mutual friends. - Open their profile. - Go to mutual friends.
